text:
Good work!
Thank you for coming to pick me up...!
Sorry, even though it's far for you...

Nah, this is my job.
Besides, I had other matters nearby!
Thanks to you, it looks like we'll make it in time today...!

No. Even when we gather as usual,
we're not exactly on time, it just takes time to get here.

Since we started preparing for the live,
we often schedule things at the last minute...

I'm the one always rushing you,
Sorry about that...!

Just the fact that you think "it's hard because it's far"
shows more than enough consideration...!

283PRO is a workplace
that's kind to people who live far away...!

Yes!
I believe many would agree with that!
It's a common experience for people who live far away.
